summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of SIPORTS 2026 application completed. Tested 16+ pages including homepage, navigation, media pages, legal pages, and authentication flow. Most functionality working correctly with excellent UI/UX design.

ui_bugs.issue: Shows error message 'Oups ! Une erreur inattendue s'est produite' instead of partner listings
Demo account buttons redirect to login page instead of authenticating user

integration_issues.issue: Unable to test dashboard functionality due to demo login not working

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and countdown timer
Exhibitors page displays exhibitor cards with search and filters
Login page shows proper form elements
Demo accounts page displays 11 demo options
Networking page loads with login requirement
Events page shows event listings with search
News page displays articles from siportevent.com
Support page shows support categories and FAQ
Legal pages (privacy, terms, cookies) all functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Partners page error and demo login authentication flow. Partners page shows 'Oups ! Une erreur inattendue s'est produite' instead of partner listings. Demo login buttons redirect to login page instead of authenticating users.
